VideoOverlay.audioBalance

Function/Meaning
Audio balance (panning)
Type
VideoOverlay class property (read/write)
Description
Represents the pan (sound image position). You can also set this value.
Specifies the left/right position where the sound is heard.
Specify a value from -100000 to 0 to 100000, where -100000 is full left, 0 is center, and 100000 is full right.
When playing a stereo source, panning is achieved by attenuating either the left or right channel (specifying 0 outputs both channels, while -100000 outputs only the left channel).
